comments_since_last_sample.body: Id like to know if they can reach 40fps for 120hz screens like ratchet and clank did. It really alleviated the worst of what 30fps offers while maintaining great visuals.

The differences between ps5 and Xbox series X are not even worth the time checken it up. Absolute ridiculous and no one will notice 2 -3 Fps during combat lol. This is nitpicking extreeeemo. And as soon as the VRR updated comes, this videos will be dated af. Also, game had not really major patches yet. 

Dual Sense gets like always 0 time in digital Foundry videos. Lovely 🙄 It’s just 1000 time more noticeable than 5 Fps during 59999 explosions^^
Ratchet and Spider-Man look better and have 60fps + ray tracing. Lol. The performance more here is a joke. But go od game anyway
man, I pity the folks who wasted money on the ps4 pro lol. Sony should be ridiculed for that blatant cash grab
wonder if Intel will push XESS updates to the consoles?
